gradientCompat.name: Gradient Trigger Compatibility
gradientCompat.description: Disables the mod if a Gradient trigger is active in a level.

tokTikUI.name: TokTik UI
tokTikUI.description:
Toggles the <cj>Tok</c><cr>Tik</c> UI.

<cy>No, the "buttons" won't be interactive anytime soon.</c>

scotusJudges.name: US Supreme Court Justices Upholding Ban
scotusJudges.description:
(Likelihood of a popup showing up when entering a level; see previous setting.)

<cy>Requires Node IDs from Geode Team.</c>

flipOrientation.name: Flip Orientation
flipOrientation.description: Flip the vertical orientation of the <cj>Tok</c><cr>Tik</c> UI.

ignoreOOBTouchesDuringGP.name: Ignore Out-of-Bounds Touches During Gameplay
ignoreOOBTouchesDuringGP.description:
Ignores any touches you make that fall outside the rotated PlayLayer screen.

<cy>Not recommended for anyone, but the option is here.</c>

disableOnPlatformer.name: Disable on Platformer Levels
disableOnPlatformer.description:
Disables the entire mod when playing Platformer levels, so that you can control the player(s) properly instead of within a cramped rotated screen area.

<cy>Highly recommended for Android users.</c>

disableOnClassic.name: Disable on Classic Levels
disableOnClassic.description: Disables the entire mod when playing Classic levels, so that y'all won't need to bother anyone for this toggle just because there's one for Platformer levels.
